name: Final Carnage
description:
Welcome to Final Carnage. Your mission is to escape the police facility and kill Big Bob. Press the flag twice to avoid glitches. This game is also very short. This will also be uploaded to scratch. If this is laggy try the project on TurboWarp. Links below.

TurboWarp:

https://turbowarp.org/653150845

Scratch:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/653150845/
